basic_information.scholarship_notes: full amount can be awarded during student teaching or last semester.

description: To provide scholarship assistance to a student who is pursuing a degree in Teacher Education. Eligibility Requirements One scholarship awarded to student admitted to student teaching One scholarship awarded to a student pursuing a degree in family science Minimum 3.0 GPA Involvement in campus organizations Submit personal essay describing how your education at UCO prepares you for your career and your career goal Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
